en.title: {{Software Engineering}} Specialist
en.text: Leading frontend optimization and performance improvements for enterprise applications:
list: Enhanced filter search UX by eliminating input lag (40% faster) using React useTransition for non-blocking updates
Optimized version graph component, reducing render time by 35% and bundle size by 18%
Reduced unnecessary re-renders through memoization and state restructuring, improving UI responsiveness by 30% under heavy data loads

en.title: {{Software Development}} Engineer
en.text: Led development of Oxygen Design System serving 40M+ monthly users:
list: Enhanced Oxygen Design System with 50+ reusable components in React and React Native
Led multiple products (CWOPR, Oxygen, Oxygen Native, ES), improving team sprint velocity by 20%
Raised snapshot test coverage to 80%, enhancing component reliability
Optimized 8-10 React components, reducing JS main-thread blocking by 120ms and lifting Lighthouse score from 84 to 92
Initiated counter-based hashing for atomic class names, reducing DOM size by 8% and improving page load time
Automated template generation via configurable panel, reducing build time by 70%

en.title: {{Associate Software}} Developer Engineer
en.text: Delivered high-impact features and optimizations for CarWale and BikeWale:
list: Delivered GoLive skin ads with complex CSS animations, boosting launch speed by 15%
Fixed INP-related priority issues, helping maintain top-4 SEO rankings
Re-engineered form components, reducing page space by 30% and increasing CTR by 40%
Led migration of BikeWale non-React pages to React, enhancing performance by 20%
Established centralized animation docs with 60+ examples, reducing revision time by 25%
Migrated components to Ozone library, reducing duplicate code by 30% and cutting PR cycle time by 20%

en.title: {{Software Developer}} Intern
en.text: Contributed to performance improvements and web development:
list: Reduced DOM nodes by 15%, improving load times by 5%
Built interactive ad templates with tracking features, boosting engagement by 18%
Transformed 20+ PSD designs into responsive web pages
Developed and optimized 15+ websites for car dealerships, maintaining 80%+ client satisfaction
